metadata.name: Ketsueki
metadata.description: The Witch Queen Rorien and her demon hordes, led by the cruel Batsu, are overrunning the land, destroying everything in their path. The demons have besieged the Shogun's castle. Hope lies with the Lady Tsuji, the Shogun's champion ? his daughter. She is a Sorceress, a warrior and wielder of the legendary sword, the Demon Killer - Ketsueki.
